bug.short_desc: MasterDetail view gets corrupt if user swipes on left edge

long_desc.thetext:
Reported by a qooxdoo Mailing List user:
Hey folks,
I stumbled across a problem and I'd like to hear if any of you are experiencing any similiar behaviour.
I have a qooxdoo mobile application running on iPad (iOs 7) with the standard master/detailpage layouting. When I try to show the hidden navigationPage (master) by sliding my finger from the left corner of the tablet into the middle, neither the "Hide" nor the "Show Navigation" Buttons are added to the navigationPages.. Therefore I'm left with both pages shown, the detailPage not being offsetted and no way to hide the master besides killing the app.
Thanks in advance for any reply.
Sincerely, T

The Drawer and the Blocker are not linked inside the framework code.
